lead_paragraph: Scott Dixon grabbed the lead on Lap 149 and had enough fuel to stay in front until rain ended the Firestone Indy 200 in Gladeville, Tenn., with 29 laps left. It was his third consecutive victory at the Nashville Superspeedway and his fourth over all this season.
